full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA CIG KHROS MA GSUM GYI SBYIN SREG GI RNAM BZHAG LAG LEN YANG GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES KHROS NAG LA BRTEN PA'I 'PHRIN LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG LAS, ZHE BA'I SBYIN SREG RJE SHES RAB RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA LTAR DANG, RGYAS PA, DBANG DANG, DRAG PO GSUM GYI SBYIN SREG BYA TSUL 'DI 'DRA DGOS ZHES MKHYEN RAB KYI DBANG PHYUG BLA BRANG PHYAG MDZOD CHEN MO GLING MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE DANG, MCHOD DPON DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO ZUNG GIS BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA CHOS SMRA BA SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG GIS BRIS PA DZA YANTU, ,)
author_simple: SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG
